title: This is a poor choice for a prepaid bank
text: I want to start this review with the first day I join Monzo. Period. A friend of mine had sent me a link an invitation as you will and it had an incentive for sign up I’ll sign up and get five dollars once you receive your card and activated or something like that I can’t remember the requirements exactly but it was nothing big I want to receive my garden met all the requirements after a little while I contacted customer support and Ashely what happened at that time they informed me that the sign-up bonuses and referral program was only for their British customers even though inside the app there is a referral button at the top left-hand corner that has a gift package on it and really kind of makes you think why is that there if I’m not allowed to use it but that’s not the reason for this poor review approximately 26 days ago at this time I was stayed in a hotel that required me to give him a $50 deposit so I’d left him that deposit on my Monzo card my deposit was released by the hotel two days later I didn’t know that though so after about 15 days I contacted Monzo and ask them hey where is my money they said oh the hotel hasn’t released it so then I called the hotel and hotel says yes we released it on the 28th so then I called Monzo and they said no they haven’t released it we promise so then I called the payment processing company, shift four, myself and I got a hold of the technical support team and the payment support team both of which assured me that there is no hold on my card they sent over the proper documentation to prove that and that my money had been released two weeks prior to that… Now the first time I contacted Monzo and asked about my money being released they told me it either has to wait 30 days for it to fall off or for the hotel to release it or if you can get us a letter from the merchant or the payment processing system saying that the money was released we will go ahead and manually release it for you so I did all of that I provided him every single thing they asked for it and once I did that they said never mind we’re gonna hold your money for the full 30 days well Manzo you aren’t emergent you have no right to my money and you are withholding money from me. And I understand why because once you realize there was no hold on it and y’all have been too lazy to check it the only way you can possibly back your own stupid play is to just play it off and let it run the timer out in the 30 days you know sometimes it’s better in life just to own up to your mistakes say we’re sorry here’s your money back

title: The Best Online banking in UK
text: U guys are the best

title: Review
text: Good

title: Most pleasant banking experience
text: Using Monzo makes it incredibly clear how much benefit designing finance around an app-first approach offers. No other bank can come close to this, and that’s because other banks were, well, banks before they were apps. Where other banking apps are user-hostile, Monzo is downright neighborly in its approach to being helpful. I can not recommend it enough to anyone looking for a primary or additional account.

title: Awful service
text: They would not let me open an account when their app is not capable of uploading two images for identity verification for me to upload my passport photo page and extension on the second page. Due to this they could only see the expired date on my photo page and could not see the passport’s extension printed on the second page as my country only does extensions. I emailed them a scan of both pages and after telling me thanks for the copy of both pages and that it would not be a problem setting up my account spent 3 weeks being with no one helping to open my account with the emailed documentation as everything is done in app. In app customer service reps could not do anything and have sort of power whatsoever in resolving anything and could not open my account as they could probably only see the one image that is able to uploaded within the app. Horrible customer service and either the app needs full functionality or a website needs to be launched to avoid future problems. Found it most annoying that when I called they reassured me that I could definitely open an account with the emailed documents they received but actually did not and I still to this day cannot open an account with my valid identity verification document.

title: Great app, could use minor tweaks
text:
Overall I’d highly recommend Monzo, especially if your flat mates or spouse has it too, because it makes transferring money so easy. The app is very user-friendly, making it easy to figure out what you spent where. 

My biggest frustration is that it’s easy to for money requests to get lost in the shuffle. Either you send your request in a text (with no proof but the message that will inevitably be buried in the rest of a conversation), or in some cases the request will appear with the rest of your spending (but again, if you don’t repay the person right away, it might get buried in your other transactions). It would be great to have a separate window showing outstanding requests to/from other Monzo users. 

I also wish there was a way to easily find your total spending from a certain slice of time, as right now you can only do it by month.

title: Worsened experience
text: I generally really enjoy monzo but the app has actually gotten less fun to play around with in one of their recent releases. I don’t know why they took away the graph that shows your spending over the month and where you could scroll back and see the amount you had at any point in time. That was one of the best qualities. Also the international money transfer experience is annoying as you always have to add the international recipient over and over again, they don’t let you save. Overall I like monzo but the app has definitely gotten worse.

title: Fantastic App, tried and tested
text: This app was recommended to me by a family member who has used this app before, the app itself is seamless, logical and user friendly. It has worked perfectly and effectively in 3 different continents I have been to recently and all the fees I may or may not incur are clearly indicted to you from the start. Plus the card looks cool.

title: Best bank I’ve ever used, BUT .
text: Monzo for me is the best bank i ever used , for many reasons like the ease of using their app and how it is connected to many amazing features, but i really need an iPad app that can work aside from the app on my iPhone because sometimes it is easier for me to use the iPad at work or at university so i really hope you consider to have a version of your app for iPad snd it is necessary that both apps will work together without signing out of one of the accounts.

title: Wonderful app, could use some QOL improvements.
text: Absolutely adore this app and bank, so much easier than anything you would find with other banks. Only thing I would ask for is a better way of securing the app. I would do this in the form of a touch ID or access pin. It would add an extra layer of security at very little expense to convenience. Other than that, an amazing way to usher in the new generation of banking.

title: Best bank and app
text: Monzo is simply the best banking app I ever used. Fast, intuitive, robust. It’s very easy to get an overview of your spending and send/receive money. You can even split bills with your Monzo friends in seconds. Also you get instant push notifications on every transaction, both in and out.

title: Latest version has a serious glitch. They don’t have an answer
text:
I had a friend try to install and open an account. The app attempts to launch then closes. It won’t open and he can initiate an account. I’ve read online about this issue as well. Some say they can’t access their account as a result. I’m concerned this may happen with my account if it updates. I’ve contacted monzo support via their chat which is frustrating as they answer every once in a while then go dark for hours after asking a question. 

Their latest response is:

“Hi Xxx, I'm so sorry for the delay here.
Are you all still having issues here? I don't believe this is something we have control over.”

Really?  It’s your app!  It’s not the brand new model iPhone with the latest iOS!

Anyway I’d highly recommend being careful at this point. Sadly. Because I was really fond of monzo

title: Incredible
text: I love everything about this app / product. So simple yet powerful. Monzo has completely change how I bank. This is also the only app I get really excited about when updates are released. And whoever writes those update notes deserves a medal. Classic stuff.

title: Amazing iOS app and service
text: The iOS app is literally one of the best I've used for banking. What I like the most is that everything from signing up until managing my account can be done from an iOS app, instead of a website.

title: Works great!
text:
I love it; I get notifications whenever someone charges something to my phone; integrates well with verification of a purchase (you buy something online and then approve it in the app. )

Highly recommend!

title: Amazing customer service
text: Best customer service of any bank - replies within 10 minutes max all through messaging on your phone. Sent a new bank card out to America for me! Great budgeting and overseas exchange rate

title: Fantastic!
text: Absolutely love Monzo. Transferring money is super easy, the interface is really nice, and using it while traveling is so convenient. I love that I’ll NEVER misplace this card because it’s neon colored. I’ve recommended it to all my friends.

title: An awesome bank with an awesome app
text:
Monzo have, in my experience, the best banking app in the U.K. Their customer support (in-app, too!) is simply unparalleled. 

I can't wait for their current account to move over to them, and this app, full time.

title: The future of banking
text: I’ve been following a few other mobile only banks and this is by far the best one. I closed my Starling account and Barclays account and am now fully Monzo!

title: Phenomenal app & services
text: Absolutely love my Monzo card. Always responsive and over deliver on all expectations like sending you a new card "within 3 days" and it reached me in less than 24hrs.

title: Great app, useful and a lot of potential
text: Would like to see more features to make it easier to manage payments, view patterns and analyse spending.

title: More categories, please
text: So far, so good. Would like to see more target categories, though. I end up putting most things under "general" (anything from gym memberships to haircuts to birthday presents), which isn't that helpful for budgeting.

title: Redefines banking
text: Never had problems with the app, makes banking really easy.

title: Used to be great; app going down hill
text: App used to be rock solid, but it now periodically crashes and logs me out. AND, each time I must reenter my email address. Crashing + forced relogin is really unexcusable. App has also been getting slower with each update.

title: Not very happy with the services
text: Account was hacked my money was gone told them and provide proof it wasn’t me taking the money from different cash machines they said they have people looking into it it’s been 2 months now and still nothing they still say they are looking into it shocking

title: Fantastic experience
text: 4 stars because a eur account is missing and the pinky card it's kinda girlish, I would like to have more choices. Great product and of course great customer service!

title: Proton mail
text: Sing up doesn’t open Protonmail app, what a garbage. Had have to go and copy paste magic link form email to messenger and open it manually. No support for US customers but available to download in US AppStore. Find out that your CEO 30 under 30 by Forbes, but a lot to work on.

title: Simply Amazing
text: Makes managing money fun. Lots of great features. I can’t recommend it high enough.

title: Not ready for primetime, but good so far
text: I haven’t switched over yet because of the lack of pots that are customizable or rename-able, check deposit, and free ATMs, but really hoping they can get these added soon!

title: Best app on the market!!
text: This app is full of really creative and valuable features. It’s a pleasure to use and the Monzo service is terrific!

title: The best bank!
text: I couldn’t sing enough praises! Just get Monzo!
